articles.author: Brad Brooks
articles.title: Native Americans decry unmarked graves, untold history of boarding schools - Reuters
articles.description: Clarence Smith was fresh off a 24-hour bus trip from his Blackfeet reservation in Montana to the Flandreau Indian School in South Dakota in the late 1980s, where he was sent by his family in the hope he would receive a better education.

articles.author: Jessie Pang
articles.title: Crowds gather for hearing of two Apple Daily executives on national security charge - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Crowds gathered outside a Hong Kong court early on Saturday ahead of a hearing for two executives of pro-democracy newspaper Apple Daily charged under the city's sweeping national security law, in a case that has drawn international condemnation.
articles.content: Police officers from the national security department escort Apple Daily's Chief Executive Officer Cheung Kim-hung from the offices of Apple Daily and Next Media in Hong Kong, China June 17, 2021. RE… [+3034 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Austrian online tutoring startup GoStudent gains valuation boost - Reuters
articles.description: Austrian online tutoring startup GoStudent has raised 205 million euros ($244 million) in new funding to reach a valuation of 1.4 billion euros, it said on Tuesday, as the business benefits from the pandemic-induced explosion in remote learning.
